main event: A civilian observed a round, red and white large ball of fire or light in the sky.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 5 minutes.,The object seemed to have a trail that came to a point.,There was no sound associated with the object.,The observer was looking out a window at a 45-degree angle.,The object appeared to disappear straight ahead to the southwest.
sighted object: round red and white large ball of fire or light
witness description: unemployed individual observing from a window
